languages.text: "Даже другим слугам Омниссии, Эксплораторам. Это был внутренний конфликт, и он ждал, что врагами его станут вчерашние техносоратники".
"Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."
languages.original_text: "Даже другим слугам Омниссии, Эксплораторам. Это был внутренний конфликт, и он ждал, что врагами его станут вчерашние техносоратники".

traits.locale_text: "Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he had expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."
"Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he had expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."
"Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."
"Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."
"Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."
"Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."

languages.text: 「万機神の共働者たるエクスプロレイターでさえもだ。内紛だったのだ、アマルナトはかつての技術同胞が敵になると予期していた」
languages.original_text: "Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."

traits.locale_text: 「万機神の共働者たるエクスプロレイターでさえもだ。内紛だったのだ、アマルナトはかつての技術同胞が敵になると予期していた」

languages.text: “即使对于欧姆尼塞亚的其他仆人与开拓者也是如此。这是一场内部冲突，他早已预料到，昔日的技术伙伴会成为他的敌人。”
languages.original_text: "Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."

traits.locale_text: “即使对于欧姆尼塞亚的其他仆人与开拓者也是如此。这是一场内部冲突，他早已预料到，昔日的技术伙伴会成为他的敌人。”

languages.text: « Même aux autres serviteurs de l'Omnimessie, les Explorators. Il s'agissait d'un conflit interne, il devait donc s'attendre à ce que ses technoconfrères d'autrefois deviennent ses ennemis. »
languages.original_text: "Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."

traits.locale_text: « Même aux autres serviteurs de l'Omnimessie, les Explorateurs. Il s'agissait d'un conflit interne, il devait donc s'attendre à ce que ses technoconfrères d'autrefois deviennent ses ennemis. »

languages.text: «Incluso a sus compañeros, los sirvientes del Omnissiah, los Exploradores. Fue un conflicto interno y esperaba que sus tecnocamaradas se convirtieran en sus enemigos».
languages.original_text: "Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."

traits.locale_text: «Incluso a sus compañeros, los sirvientes del Omnissiah, los Exploradores. Fue un conflicto interno y esperaba que sus tecnocamaradas se convirtieran en sus enemigos».

languages.text: "Selbst für andere Diener des Omnissiah, die Exploratoren. Es war ein interner Konflikt, und er hatte erwartet, dass seine einstigen Techkameraden zu seinen Feinden werden."
languages.original_text: "Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."

traits.locale_text: "Selbst für andere Diener des Omnissiah, die Exploratoren. Es war ein interner Konflikt, und er hatte erwartet, dass seine einstigen Techkameraden zu seinen Feinden werden."

languages.text: "Diğer Hermesih hizmetkârları olan Keşiftörlere bile yasaklamış. İç çatışma yaşanmış, eski tekno yoldaşlarının düşmanı olmasını beklemiş."
languages.original_text: "Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."

traits.locale_text: "Diğer Hermesih hizmetkârlarına, Keşiftörlere bile. Bir iç çatışma yaşanmış ve eski tekno yoldaşlarının düşmanı olmasını beklemiş."
